price: 53. Na boye nde totiaki bango na bango na kati ya komekama mpo baloba ete: Ba oyo nde Allah apesi bango bolamu likolo na biso? Boye Allah te nde ayebi baye bapesaka melesi?
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ فَتَنَّا بَعۡضَهُم بِبَعۡضٖ لِّيَقُولُوٓاْ أَهَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنۢ بَيۡنِنَآۗ أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَعۡلَمَ بِٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika fatannā baʿḍahum bibaʿḍin liyaqūlū ahāulāi manna al-lahu ʿalayhim min bayninā alaysa al-lahu bi-aʿlama bil-shākirīna
